website_summaries.verdict: Innovative design makes them comparable to more expensive brands at a much better price.
pros: Constructed out of silicone with fiberglass mesh encased inside
This provides durability and even heating every time
Three mats for the price is a bargain
cons: Cannot cut these to fit your cookie sheets due to the fiberglass inside

customer_reviews.title: Take this precaution before using
customer_reviews.text: Many people complain about the smell and taste that they leave to certain foods when cooking them, especially cookies, it happened to me and I managed to solve the problem, do this so they do not have problems. 1.- Wash very well 2 ..- Take the oven for 30 minutes at 180 C or 350 F 3.- Wash again very well 4.- Grease with vegetable oil on both sides, take to the oven for 30 minutes more. 5.- Wash very well and ready...
customer_reviews.author: Hector Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pack of 3 liners 3 years ago and just replaced it due to wear. I hand wash, only use rubber / silicone spatulas and never put it in the dishwasher. The lining started to come off of the old set so I replaced it. Overall very happy with the set and think it is reasonable to replace after 3 years. Great for the price. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ElizM

customer_reviews.title: Use them almost every day
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for over a year and they're still in perfect condition. I use them for cookies, roasting veggies, literally any time I put a baking sheet in my oven I use one. Sometimes they'll get marked up if I use high heat, but it always comes off with a good scrub. Nothing sticks to them so long as you cook it fully. I've found they usually need to be hand washed because the grease doesn't come off in the dishwasher, and they don't work well for cookies if they have any grease on them.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Macri

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted a set of these for years. I love how easily food slides off of them and how nice my baked goods turn out. They do a great job of protecting my pans from wear and tear, and they've allowed me to cut down/eliminate parchment paper and aluminum foil. I'm not a fan of cleaning them, which is a pain. But that's not the fault of this product, that's just how it is with silicone mats. I've had some success washing them in the dishwasher if you can prop them up just right so they get cleaned and dried from all angles.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The mats arrived as expected with a number of other baking items I had ordered. We wasted no time putting them to the test. they worked better then expected! My daughter made her signature dessert, chocolate chip cookies, I asked her to try the new baking sheets which she did reluctantly, she doesnt like change. She was very happy the cookies cooked as expected, none of them stuck, and they cleaned easily. I did not rate them on durability because ive only had them for about a week.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Voss

customer_reviews.title: I really like these
customer_reviews.text: I like these as they are easier to clean than cookie sheets, and storing them in a drawer is pretty cool... They take some getting used to, you recipe books won't tell you how to use them.... A couple of Google searches and you will figure out... Get some silicone pot holders to go with them, no slips, no burns... Great product... Full size ones are still pricey
customer_reviews.author: Brian K Locke

customer_reviews.title: Keeps casseroles from slipping on a cookie sheet.
customer_reviews.text: I have not used these for baking yet. i ordered after I removed a casserole from the oven that I had put on a cookie sheet to catch drips. As I removed it, the dish started to slide and before I could stop it it was upside down on the floor. (My sweet hubby went out for tacos!) Since the mats arrived I used it to stabilize other dishes and they don't move at all. Even if I never use them for baking they will be well worth the money. I don't enjoy scraping dinner off the floor.!
customer_reviews.author: Net shopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: These mats are a nice way to save you money and reduce our waste by using the mats instead of baking paper. I've been using them a lot, the only thing that "happened" (which is not a quality problem or anything) is that one of the mats fell on the heating element in my dishwasher and the silicone came off at the part where it touched it. So you should be careful when it comes to that, but overall there is nothing to complain about this product.
customer_reviews.author: dyzi11

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used parchment paper for years and only recently tried a silicone mat. No matter what pan I used I always seemed to have burnt bottoms of cookies- even with different stoves. A Christmas gift of a silicone mat changed all that, so much so that I ordered this set from Amazon. Inexpensive but impressive results! Am very happy with them. Nothing sticks, cookies bake evenly. Now I wonder why I waited so long to use silicone mats!
customer_reviews.author: wildlifemom

customer_reviews.title: Great mats!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to set these. This is my second set of these, my first were destroyed in a fire and I was so happy to see them here on Amazon. These are such a time saver for me and as a chef, I use them every day at home. They are so easy to just wipe down, disinfect and good to go again. You will not be sorry to get these.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sil-pats by any other name...
customer_reviews.text: As I get more and more into baking, I've started going through (read: wasting) a lot of parchment paper. I'd been considering getting sil-pats after having heard about them in multiple reviews and baking sites. When I saw these on sale, I jumped. I've already baked several batches of cookies and I LOVE these mats. I'll always have a need for parchment paper, but not for cookies, not any more! Totally non-stick, super easy to clean, and easy to use, I'm ecstatic I made this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: LeeJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to replace several older silicon mats that had been abused over the years (kids cutting their pizza on it, edges starting to fray, etc.) These arrived on time, at a good price, and I learned that a Half Sheet size is still a tad large for the baking sheets I have. This is not an issue with the product ordered, just with the baking sheets I have. So now I'm searching for 'true half sheet' baking pans! In summary, product works as advertised, good price, fast shipping. I might order these for Christmas presents for several baking friends!
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome! I am an avid baker and was sick ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I am an avid baker and was sick of cutting parchment paper to fit my baking sheets. I had always wanted to try Silpats after always seeing them on the food network. However at about $30 a sheet I just couldn't make myself pay that. These are the exact same thing and for a fraction of the price for one Silpat I got 3 sheets! They fit the standard sheet pan perfectly and my cookies, pastry and savory goodies come right off perfectly baked. The best part you just throw them in the dishwasher. I highly recommend... great product and awesome value!!!
customer_reviews.author: brooke sifert

customer_reviews.title: Roasted Asparagus and Roasted Green Beans
customer_reviews.text: I made Roasted Asparagus and Roasted Green Beans for Easter dinner. They browned beautifully. Everyone loved the food and I loved the total ease of clean up. Just put them in a sink of sudsy water and wipe off and you are done. No more scrubbing the cookie sheet to get the baked on stuff off. The cookie sheet didn't have anything baked on. I will be telling my friends.
customer_reviews.author: N. Hood

customer_reviews.title: Magic baking Sheets!
customer_reviews.text: I love these baking mats--I do a lot of baking sweet potatoes and roasting vegetables. The baked on ooze can be most difficult to clean up but with these mats, let them soak a few minutes in soapy water, wash off. That easy. Absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.author: B. Kessler

customer_reviews.title: Great baking mats!
customer_reviews.text: Good mats to use for baking, rolling fondant, and decorating desserts. When baking cookies, it really helps to retain the shape. Tip: make sure you wipe off the mat completely before use. Crumbs can easily stick to the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: This product release he smoke and fumes when baking and ...
customer_reviews.text: This product release he smoke and fumes when baking and leaves a weird taste on the cookies
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Maximum temperature of 480*F
customer_reviews.text: I have not used these yet, but wanted to post pictures of the packaging to show that they are made in China and that they are capable of up to 480*F.
customer_reviews.author: tony d.

customer_reviews.title: Seriously bad small
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, there is a very bad smell with these. I have used all three, cleaned them with Dawn and baking soda and they still smell bad. I’ve tried every cleaning trick but they retain the odor - it’s sort of a sour, funk. Like a damp towel that has been allowed to sit unattended. They work fine but my 15 year old very tired Silpat works better. What a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila P.

customer_reviews.title: awful
customer_reviews.text: Returned this as it seemed to absorb the taste and smell of everything it got near. Even the dishwasher detergent. And when you heat it up the smell comes out and ruins the taste of the food.
customer_reviews.author: Heather M. Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Color comes off and they melt
customer_reviews.text: Washed them in hot soapy water and when I started to dry them the dish towel turned orange! The color was rubbing off the sheet onto the towel. I finally had one that didn't run off and I baked some cookies at 350 degrees for 13 minutes. The mat had a quarter size area on the underside that had melted!!! I will never buy cheap mats again. I will save my money until I can afford the ones made in France, they are used on all of the baking shows and I don't think they would use an inferior product like these were.😤
customer_reviews.author: Mary M

customer_reviews.title: Non stick. Left some weird taste on my food.
customer_reviews.text: When using them (180F oven) to dry some fruit leather, it left some funky tastes on my food, though I read on another review(s) that it goes away. Not sure how poisonous that was but I didn't want to chance it so I threw the food out. I'll try again and let you guys know.
customer_reviews.author: Team Midori

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, pain to clean!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the idea of these mats being environmentally friendly since they are reusable. The problem is when it came to cleaning them... OMG! They have to be hand washed which is fine but they are very different to keep a hold of because they become ridiculously slipperly when wet and flop all over, plus if you bake something with oil it doesn't want to come off easy. I had to stop using these because my hands were cramping from gripping during the wash.
customer_reviews.author: LaceyK

customer_reviews.title: Slightly big for most cookie pans
customer_reviews.text: These are slightly big for most standard cookie pans, and I'm told you can cut them without any issue, although I have yet to do that. They clean very easily and have held up well. The two biggest downfalls: You cannot use them with the broiler (at least instructions say you should not) and the bottom does not get very crispy because this liner acts sort of like and insulation blanket, so you either have to extend the cook time to get a crispy bottom on certain foods, or just live with it; or just don't use the mats.
customer_reviews.author: BigFishRacing

customer_reviews.title: Makes cleaning a cinch. Retains smell.
customer_reviews.text: These mats work great as advertised. My only criticism of them is that strong smells linger. If they came in different colors, I would designate one for meat, one for cookies, and one for other non-smelly stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smoky!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I got sent a mat with human hair sealed in it and I contacted the seller for refund which they were happy to issue. I’ve been playing with them for a while, and even though I did condition the mats like I was supposed to (pre-bake, rinse and pre-bake again with oil rubbed in), I still get smoky mats quite often and the bottom of my baked goods come out tar black (at all different temperatures). I’m setting them aside for now and maybe will be in the mood to work with them again later....
customer_reviews.author: Bowie

customer_reviews.title: After 3 years, I'm finally reviewing these FABULOUS Silicone Baking Mats
customer_reviews.text: Well, I'm not sure why I didn't get around to reviewing this product earlier, but after three years, they have certainly stood the test of time. They are perfectly sized for my cookie sheets and are very thick and sturdy. Nothing sticks to these babies! I am a prolific cookie baker and these mats deliver a perfect result every time. Clean-up is a breeze. I just wipe them with a soapy dish sponge, rinse and air dry. They look exactly the same as the day I bought them. Such a great product at a phenomenal price!
customer_reviews.author: Mac Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great as a gift and for home use
customer_reviews.text: I love the my silicone mats, they are really easy to use and clean. I’d definitely recommend to others as a gift as well, not to mentions this mats are a great investment if you’re always buying parchment paper or grease proof paper as it saves money. My only complain for the product was, the person delivering didn’t put my order on my steps like every other time. The delivery person just placed it in my garden for some reason..... not you guys fault. Thank you for this awesome product.... you guys rock
customer_reviews.author: KELLY

customer_reviews.title: These silicone baking mats don't scorch easily and are a great induction cooktop protector!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love my fancy German induction cooktop, especially with restored cast iron cookware. But those ceramic surfaces are scratch prone. 3 of these silicone mats protect my cooktop perfectly. Unlike the previous mats I purchased, which scorched, these are good for temperatures up the "jumping water droplet" stage like you might use for pancakes, and even beyond. I'm sure this is not approved by the maker of my cooktop, but I have had _no_ problems.
customer_reviews.author: Upton O'Goode

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only recently received these but they are of similar thickness and quality of the one I have had for years (which I accidentally cut). These mats are the best for baking everything from meats to oven roasted veggies because they are easy to clean and spare you from scrubbing a pan. They’re nice for rolling out cookie dough or pie dough. I use mine for putting together appliqué with fusible backing because the part you aren’t fusing doesn’t stick - it just peels off. They’re a must in the kitchen and elsewhere and it’s nice to have more than one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will Be Using for ALL Baking
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these after a recipes I wanted to try suggested using a silicone baking mat and used them for the first time tonight. I saw a review that suggested how you should treat them, but I was too lazy to follow all the steps lol. I washed them, then put them in the oven for 30 min at 350 and washed them again. My cookies came out great and didn’t stick, so I’m in love! Super easy to clean. I recommend! Definitely will be a staple for my future baking endeavors.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Big and super easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t call it a half sheet, but I would rather too big than too small. Burnt on fish and cheese come off easily with a wet rag - so I’m happy. :) I would buy again. Word to the wise, always use a towel or pot holder to remove from the oven! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Emily D. H.

customer_reviews.title: Buy This!
customer_reviews.text: I used this as soon as it arrived. Worked perfectly - evenly distributed heat on the bottom of the croissants. Clean-up was a breeze...burnt crust slid right off. The mats fit my bigger cookie sheets; the only brand I found that fit standard sheets. There was no chemical odor in my set, and there was no oily film that some reviews complained of. Very pleased and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Tinsley

customer_reviews.title: The silicone mats are the only thing I will use to bake all my cookies. They are awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the silicone baking mats. We made 45 dozen cookies today and it was so much easier using the silicone mats. The cookies were so easy to remove and the mats were easy to clean and reuse. We had 6 half sheet pans and the mats and me and my son worked together and always had pans ready to put in the oven. It saved so much time. We previously used parchment paper which was time consuming and the mats are so much better. Everything baked evenly.
customer_reviews.author: LANA M BELL

customer_reviews.title: burned my bread
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with this purchase, I made two batch of bread and this burned the bottom of my bread. It was only on 350 and did not allow the bread to bake thoroughly before forming a thick black crust, setting off my fire alarms at 1 am (which is when I have time to bake bread) very disappointed. After washing the mat, the impression of bread was still burnt into the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Regsparkle

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Mats!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had some of these, and I loved them so much I had to buy some for myself. I use them constantly now. Nothing sticks to them, so clean up is so quick and easy. And I don't have to add oil or waste parchment paper. I'm planning to order some more to give to my mom.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: They worked great..
customer_reviews.text: This was my first set of baking mats. I was excited to try them. I used them to make pumpkin cookies. They worked great...cleaned up easy BUT I could never use them for anything else afterward. The pumpkin/spice smell kinda cooked into them and made any other cookie I made taste off. I wouldn't recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Herbst

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: Uhm amazing! I’m lazy and wash them in the dishwasher. I’m not saying they are “dishwasher safe” if you want to know read the description, but on the top shelf they come out clean. They do have a soap smell when baking (after washing) but the smell doesn’t transfer to taste in the food. Makes clean up after baking easier.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnalynn Beal

customer_reviews.title: Not cookies.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for items other than cookies. I usually bake on parchment paper. Wanted to switch and use silicones. The edge of my cookies were darker than normal, the edges of my cookies cracked. Doesn’t happen on parchment. While baking I switch back to parchment (same batch of CC cookies), my edges didn’t burn as fast nor did they crack. Also, the Mat can decrease in width about one centimeter. Two max. It doesn’t fit 100% in my sheet pans. I’ll keep the mats for other items I bake just not cookies. Worked perfect for the garlic bacon I baked!
customer_reviews.author: Janelle a coles

customer_reviews.title: Great for bread
customer_reviews.text: I've used this mainly to make sourdough bread. In order to get the bread softer, I need it to be wetter in consistency. This product allows me to do that without worrying about the bread sticking to the pan. I would definitely recommend this to anyone doing any kind of baking that might involve your baked goods sticking. Read the directions. The one thing I learned is not to let the mat sit in the oven as it preheats. That's not something I normally do, but I know it's a technique many use, so beware!
customer_reviews.author: edc582

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my wife and I have to say that I am sorry she didn't have them years ago. I even got into the kitchen to help her with some baking for a Christmas party and was amazed at how well they work. Anything left on these mats after baking slide right off as you rinse them under water. They fit perfectly in our cookie sheets and made clean up a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: PBW

customer_reviews.title: Get it you'll love it. Great gift for anyone.
customer_reviews.text: Ok I just love this. I got 3 and was so happy with it I gave one to my mom to try out. The food is soo good and its soo easy to use and clean. I have 4 kids and time is a but thing for me as well as money and my kids actually eating the food. It has help with all of it! I kinda like that its bigger than my sheet so I don't have to scrub it from all the fat.
customer_reviews.author: Just a mom

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever for baking!
customer_reviews.text: WHY did I wait so long to get these! I make up to 15 different kinds of Christmas cookies every year. I bought these and used them 3 days straight. Not a single issue. No chemical spray, no scraping the "non stick" cookie sheets. Extremely easy to clean up! I want them for EVERY size baking sheet I have! No more parchment paper!
customer_reviews.author: Sean P. Vukas

customer_reviews.title: These are great! I’ve baked cookies and pizza braids on them ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I’ve baked cookies and pizza braids on them and they make clean up a snap. They did come with some sort of black marks on some of them that I had to scrape off (or didn’t even come off). Thankfully none of it is where food would sit.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: great fit for half baking sheets
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfectly in my half baking sheet and work great. However if you have those 17 By 11 pan they will not sit flat so my Wife will not use them with those pans. I have made many loaves of bread on these already and have not burned one bottom and the bread releases with anything sticking,
customer_reviews.author: CrazyG

customer_reviews.title: A very nice, high quality silicone baking mat x 3!
customer_reviews.text: A very nice, high quality silicone baking mat x 3! So glad I received my new baking mats quickly. I was replacing one that I had used for a long time and had seen better days. The Velesco mat is clearly as nice or nicer than the one I was replacing and works great. I just used it last night under my oven roasted sweet potato fries. It worked great and was uber easy to clean. I'm very pleased with my purchase. Plan to share the other two with my adult kids.
customer_reviews.author: MI Artist

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME product - easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Have used these twice in the first week of having them. Once for homemade rolls and once for homemade cookies. Very pleased with the ease of use and the actual baking process. Cleanup was a breeze in the dishwasher although probably a quick wipe down would've been sufficient. Definitely a good buy! Only negative is that I wish they had bigger ones to fit on my large cookie sheets. These worked beautifully though so will not complain.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE BAKING MATS
customer_reviews.text: I love these baking mats - I use them almost every day. I originally bought them to make cookies, which is nice that it comes in a three pack so that you can have 3 batches going at once, but I actually ended up using them on a daily basis to roast veggies. The clean super easily and are just fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Another item to clean but they work!
customer_reviews.text: These are super slick and easy to clean with soap and water. Baked fish on it and the fish just slides off to serve! They don't fit a standard baking pan very well though. The length is a little short and the width over laps the corners. Much better than foil for sure.
customer_reviews.author: CatDaddy & Biatch

customer_reviews.title: Great for baking.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to use for our annual Christmas cookie baking. We really put them through the wringer making 7 different cookies and about 5 pounds of flour for each type. They worked fabulously. They cooled fast for our pan rotation and no problems with sticking. The cookies slid right off. I would highly recommend these. We have more baking to do this weekend and I will be using these again.
customer_reviews.author: CSamm

customer_reviews.title: Makes cleanup easy !
customer_reviews.text: These silicone sheets are very good quality. I have used them for baking everything from baked salmon to chocolate chip cookies. They clean very easily by hand. But also can go in the dishwasher. That is especially good with things like fish , which has a strong smell. I simply lay them over the dividers, and they come out like new.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Kravitz

customer_reviews.title: SILPATs make sure you wont burn the bread on the bottom!
customer_reviews.text: Never used these before but my bread always burned on the bottom where it made contact with the pan. The worked perfectly. Needed nothing, put 'em on the pan and that's it. Washed up perfectly in the dishwasher. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Leo M. Rosenstein

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after a friend recommended them. They work amazing. So much that my ex and I fought over who got to keep them in the divorce. In case you're wondering, he won...but really I'm the winner because mine are brand new now ;-)
customer_reviews.author: N. M.

customer_reviews.title: Revolutionary for baking
customer_reviews.text: I've had a set of three of these for over a year now and am buying another set. I use these for everything. When i need to roll out a very sticky dough i put one underneath and one on top and just roll it out. The top sheet just comes right off. After a year of consistent use (3-5 times a week) they are still in perfect condition, no wear. The second set I am buying is because i find myself needing more than 3 at times.
customer_reviews.author: red queen is winning

customer_reviews.title: Silicone Mats Worth the Money!
customer_reviews.text: I asked for these mats for Christmas, but couldn't wait & bought them myself. We used them for our crescent rolls on Christmas Eve, and finally the rolls were cooked perfectly with just the correct golden brown on the top & bottom. Usually they are golden on top, but burnt on the bottom. We also used them at my nieces at Christmas for her rolls & again they came out perfect. I can't wait to use them for cookies. I have many cookie sheets, but only two were non-stick, and they still would burn or over cook on the bottom. I am very pleased with these mats, and will be using for all my baking needs. Thank you. AMD
customer_reviews.author: Ann Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous help in my baking
customer_reviews.text: I use these mats for all my baking. They are easy to clean, save my cookie sheets from getting dirty and rinse off easily. They last a long time. My last set was used for two years. I bake almost every day, and I also use them for making sweet potato chips and apple chips. I just spread the sliced veggies and fruit on the mats and place them in the oven on 200 degress for six hours. The mats still look like new.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Jakowenko

customer_reviews.title: Save money
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I do have issue with the transference of heat. It’s not fully coming through. Some of my bakes should be crispy and they aren’t. I’m saving money on parchment but not getting the desired results on my bakes.
customer_reviews.author: Abelardo Rivera-Baez

customer_reviews.title: Great non-stick, awkward size
customer_reviews.text: Great for non-stick baking and easy to clean after use. Maybe it’s just my baking sheets, but they fit awkwardly vs the dimensions of my cookie sheets (a little too long and narrow). Still great and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: etmama

customer_reviews.title: Good quality sheets
customer_reviews.text: First time using sheets instead of parchment. Worked great and easy to wipe down. Only thing I would caution is pay attention to the size. My Wilton cookie sheets were too small and these hung over the sides which cause the outside cookies to slide in a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Mls

customer_reviews.title: I've roasted veggies a half a dozen times now and they just clean off easily with soap and water
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe it took me so long to find these! I will never have to buy new cookie trays again! These protect your trays from the awful burning that occurs during the oven. I've roasted veggies a half a dozen times now and they just clean off easily with soap and water. Sometimes I put them in the dishwasher....either way, they are easily cleaned and leave your trays clean too! I would recommend this to anyone who enjoys cooking in the oven without having to worry about soaking pans and scrubbing forever. This is a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Silicone baking mats
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. My product came as promised. This is great! I do a great deal of cooking so now I don't have to worry about running out of parchment paper, these are terrific, and so easy to clean!!! I recommend this product and this seller!
customer_reviews.author: Elpida

customer_reviews.title: Save your cookie sheets and baking dishes. Never scrub a stuck on baking sheet again.
customer_reviews.text: They are a Christmas gift. I have two I use every day, I love it! It saves my cookie sheets and the environment because I don't have to use a throw away liner of foil or parchment paper. I cook everything on it. Chicken, fries, fish, breads, cookies ... anything that cooks in the oven. It does not hold food odors. Clean up is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Don't wait- you'll love them!
customer_reviews.text: I waited a long time before purchasing, but so glad I did! Being an avid baker, parchment paper is some what a necessity; and is expensive and tedious. These mats handled my Italian cookies with just the right amount of browning on the bottom and glided right off; no sticking. Clean up was a snap, dried the mats and rolled them up ready to go when needed. Will definitely be buying more- great product- shouldn't have waited!!
customer_reviews.author: Lassie Girl

customer_reviews.title: As good as the expensive French brand. Save money and get these.
customer_reviews.text: We used the original brand for 4 years and it was time to replace one of them. Based on other reviews I tried an off brand to save money. That was a good choice. I like these as well or better. Berry pie that leaked on the mat was an easy clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great non stick mat
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I am buying these . The first ones lasted for years . They are durable and easy to use . The only problem is you need to use a Brillo pad to get the oil off . Otherwise they are a great product .
customer_reviews.author: Shari Green

customer_reviews.title: Great mats awesome price
customer_reviews.text: Had these over a year. Use for roasting, baking and anything I’d use parchment for. Wash in my washing machine, still like new. I saw the reviews criticizing high heat, not my experience
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality!
customer_reviews.text: These are so amazing I don't think I will bake on anything else after using these a few times. So far I have just baked biscuits on these but they come out perfect every time and absolutely no sticking. Clean up is a snap and they can be rolled up for compact storage saving valuable space. They make great gifts as well. I recommend you try these, you will like them.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Greatt
customer_reviews.text: I love these and thanks to another reviewer I washed first before used and baked them at 350 for about 30mins then washed again and wiped with cooking oil lightly and then baked again and then washed...they are great and let me cook my cookies thoroughly without burning the bottoms and my dogs treats.
customer_reviews.author: boras bushayy

customer_reviews.title: Not Dishwasher safe unless you want everything to taste like SOAP!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used my mats for a year or two now and have enjoyed them. Our family life became a little crazy the last few months and because of that these mats ended up in the dishwasher a few times. Now if I cook anything light in flavor on these mats it leaves an overwhelming soap taste on it from the mats. The mats themselves have a very very strong soap smell. These are NOT DISHWASHER safe as the product tells you, very misleading.... Silpat at least tells you not to use soap or put them in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! I love these baking pads. They make everything work better and clean up is a breeze. if I sound like I love them, it is because i do. Thease are a gift for someone who will love them as much as I do. Great price, fast shipping, who could ask for anything more?!
customer_reviews.author: Red Head 918

customer_reviews.title: Caused Smoking in Oven
customer_reviews.text: Been using silicon mats for a while so I know what to expect. These smoked badly in the oven. I cleaned/dried them beforehand and they still caused smoke. Wouldn't recommend for electric stoves.
customer_reviews.author: L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: not as good as a Silpat
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as extra mats since less expensive than our Silpat mats. Used them to bake sticky Pignoli cookies. First batch on these mats resulted in some stuck cookies that took a little effort to remove and left some residue. Second batch on the Silpat mats resulted in no problem removing cookies...and very little residue. Third batch on these mats resulted in the same problem as the first batch on these mats. Silpat mats are definitely better but for the average use...these mats are fine.
customer_reviews.author: bud4u

customer_reviews.title: Handy Cooking Mats
customer_reviews.text: I've not tried the "Original" mats (Rhymes with Philpat), but these are amazing. Cookies slide right off, and after 30 years of washing cookie sheets, I'll not be without these. The kicker is, my 14 year old macaroon baker ordered these because her french cookies kept sticking, even after purchasing a "Cake Boss" cookie sheet just made for them. I may have to give these out as gifts for holidays, that's how neat they are.
customer_reviews.author: ColoRN

customer_reviews.title: Silpat set is great
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 mats this time as my husband is baking more and needed them more available then they are currently in our gadgets and tools. Thanks for selling the set. Makes it much easier then having to reuse the same mat over and over.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hot Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I noticed there's different temperature ratings for silicone baking mats. The old mats I had were scorched and creased, so I decided to try these as a replacement. They're rated at 480F, which is higher than some other mats. I've used them several times for baking and they work well and were nicely priced. I have no complaints about them.
customer_reviews.author: Jim of Oz

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these! I use them regularly. Baking with these definitely helps with getting more even bakes and prevents burning the bottoms of cookies and bread. I also use these for roasting vegetables. They clean easily and don’t get dark like other mats I have used. I like that the ends are angled because it fits in the sheet pans perfectly. This is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara R.

customer_reviews.title: Oven Mats
customer_reviews.text: These are the best thing ever, wish I had when I was raising my family. These were gifts to the family to save time in clean up. They like them as well. Ours feel greasy at times just need a degreaser and hot water for clean up
customer_reviews.author: Judy Dailey

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are thick mats that fit 11x17 mat though a little large for my pan. I used them the day I got them to bake cookies @ 350°F. They work very well, absolutely no sticking, no bottoms burned on cookies, easy to remove from pans & very easy to clean. I just leave them in the pan(s) after washing them with mild detergent & warm water & drying them thoroughly. Always ready when & where I need them & not a problem with storage.
customer_reviews.author: Conan's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Happy baker
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few different ones and these are by far the best ones. You need these if you bake they stick to the counter and don’t move I’m so happy with my purchase wish I had purchased these first!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Get the job done.
customer_reviews.text: We are using these in our home baking business and this is our second time ordering them. They are wonderful. Work just perfect for our cookies. We usually bake 120-240 cookies at a time and these are the perfect ticket for quick and easy baking.
customer_reviews.author: honeypeaches

customer_reviews.title: And she has never had good cookie sheets
customer_reviews.text: The silicone mats I got were for my daughter. She has never heard or used them. So I got them for her to use. I have 6 mats I used mine all the time when i baked. And she has never had good cookie sheets. She makes cookies for her to kids for home and school parties.
customer_reviews.author: ESTHER LOWE

customer_reviews.title: A must for the cookie maker
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of cleaning cookie sheets with sticking bits from finished cookies when I heard about these mats from a friend. Heading into the season where I produce 40 + dozen cookies in a 2 week period, I was excited to give them a try. The mats came the next day and after 3 uses in the last week, I have not been disappointed. This was a good and inexpensive investment in my baking equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Marian Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to a baker’s kitchen
customer_reviews.text: They take a long time to air dry- recommend drying off with towel after cleaning. Best for gentle baking like pastries and sweets, up to 450 degrees Fahrenheit. Don’t recommend for crusted items like bread and pizza.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria, Va

customer_reviews.title: Super helpful
customer_reviews.text: Man I love these silicone baking mats. I have this weird aversion to PAM and also touching butter with my hands, so these are great. I have this 3-pack and a name-brand SilPat, no noticeable difference in performance. It's nice to have at least two so you can have one baking in the oven while you put raw dough/batter on the next one and then just switch them back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: Hallie

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite purchases
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! Love how they keep everything off of the baking sheets. I have pretty cheap baking sheets and feel like these mats will prolong me from having to buy decent ones. Just remember that you’ll have to soak them to really get any thick greasy feeling off of them. Aside from that, I use them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great for cookies & macarons!
customer_reviews.text: I love using these when I’m baking, cute back in using parchment paper and my cookies never stick. They are easy to clean- I usually use soap and water instead of the dishwasher but I’m sure they would be fine there.
customer_reviews.author: Pastry Goddess

customer_reviews.title: Great baking mats.
customer_reviews.text: I really love these silicone baking mats. I never have an item that sticks to the pan and all things seem to cook a little more quickly and evenly with these mats. I definitely would recommend these if you have never tried them before.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Lover

customer_reviews.title: Every baker needs these
customer_reviews.text: These are the best mats for baking cookies. No need for greasing the baking sheets and the cleanup is easy. I’ve had many over the years and use them regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Renate Beedon

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I have never had silicone baking sheets but decided to give these a try. I love them! My cutout cookies slid right off and so easy to wash. Def would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy of 7

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: Game changer! I’ve been using aluminum foil and spray oil daily to bake my cauliflower pizza crust and other vegetables and proteins. The oil gets everywhere and even worse it’s toxic especially with use of aluminum. I’ve been trying to make my household and kitchen products less toxic and find alternatives and this is one of the best purchases!
customer_reviews.author: parviz khaloyan

customer_reviews.title: NO STICKING
customer_reviews.text: I was prepared to be disappointed in this product as I thought the were a lot of empty hype. Boy, was I wrong! I make crackers with a batter so thin I use an offset spatula to spread it. I usually lose a portion because of sticking. With these mats I was able to spread the batter thinner than ever before and NO STICKING. Couldn’t be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Idril

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous for baking
customer_reviews.text: First time I’ve every tried silicone mats. Always used parchment paper. I love these mats. Used them for cookie baking. Fabulous. No need to keep buying and throwing away parchment paper.
customer_reviews.author: mary kepp

customer_reviews.title: The best silicone liner I have used so far
customer_reviews.text: I have purchase several silicone liners for my counter and this is the best by far easy to clean and hold up to heat from pots and pans. Very attractive as well
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than parchment paper.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I use them to make macarons. Incredible improvement over parchment paper. Less waste and they don't warp and crinkle like parchment paper. They're also great for rolling out pie dough, fondant, gum paste, baking regular cookies, baking pizza. I love em
customer_reviews.author: deragon

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye parchment  paper!
customer_reviews.text: Love these so much that this set is for my daughter-in-law who loves to bake. They are the greatest, fit the pans perfectly, and no more fly-away parchment paper.
customer_reviews.author: BLH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I use these all the time for baking cookies. I even used them for hor'doevres. Very easy to clean and keeps my cookies sheets spotless! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for quite a while now and they work beautifully! They've help up really well and are generally pretty easy to clean up (some foods you have to work to scrub off, but overall not bad).
customer_reviews.author: anoptimist

customer_reviews.title: Great baking mats
customer_reviews.text: I love these baking mats. I wasn’t sure what side to cook on and the first batch of cookies where cooked on the wrong side it worked but it left some dark spots Which were kind of tough to remove. I thought I read that the writing on top was supposed to be face down. WRONG! I should’ve just went with my gut. Nothing has stained or’s deck since then and I’ve used them for a few months now and I bake often. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: lynn r

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have had another brand for years and I love these. They keep the pans clean so that I don't hav eto wash them as much and the food rarely sticks. I have not tried them on a grill but may this summer. Will let you know after I try one.
customer_reviews.author: FatMilkDud

customer_reviews.title: On the fence.
customer_reviews.text: These are good to have around in a pinch but not nearly as convenient as parchment paper. Takes some scrubbing to clean them but nice to have around when you run out of parchment paper.
customer_reviews.author: meschu

product_meta.title: Silicone Baking Mat - Set of 3 Half Sheet (Thick & Large 11 5/8" x 16 1/2") - Non Stick Silicon Liner for Bake Pans & Rolling - Macaron/Pastry/Cookie/Bun/Bread Making - Professional Grade Nonstick
product_meta.description:
STOP EATING TONS OF CHOLESTEROL, SATURATED FAT & CANCEROGENIC SUBSTANCES PRODUCED BY COOKING OILS SUBJECTED TO HIGH TEMPERATURES!

Instead of lubricating your baking sheet with oil & fat, make it nonstick with Velesco Silicone Baking Mat!

Not only does it eliminate potentially dangerous elements from your diet, but it also makes your life a bit easier and more enjoyable. Because once you finish baking, all you need to do is to rinse the mat in warm soapy water, roll it up & store.

And most of the time, you don't even have to wash your sheet.

IT'S ABSOLUTELY THE BEST BANG FOR YOUR BUCK!

Save on cooking oils & fat! Stop buying miles of parchment paper! And save on baking sheets & pans!

The only reason why you trash them prematurely is because over time, they get damaged by burnt sugar & fat, as well as by abrasive cleaning products.

Our silicone baking mats keep all the nasty stuff away from your baking sheets & pans causing them to last much longer.

HERE IS WHY PEOPLE ABSOLUTELY LOVE THESE MATS

- 100% Non-Stick & Easy-To-Clean
- Thick & Large - Perfect Fit for Standard Oven
- Multi-Purpose - Baking, Kneading, Rolling & Freezing
- Durable & Long Lasting - Good for Thousands of Uses
- Perfect, Consistent Results Every Time You Bake
- Oven, Microwave, Dishwasher & Freezer Safe
- Food Safe, Non-Toxic, Hypoallergenic & Healthy
- Eco-Friendly - Non-Toxic & Fully Recyclable
- Saves Space - Rolled, It Takes Very Little Space

BEST 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE

We are dedicated to your satisfaction. Shop with confidence!

*** SCROLL UP & CLICK THE ADD TO CART BUTTON NOW! ***
feature_bullets: THICK/LARGE & MULTI-PURPOSE: Fits US standard half size baking sheets (16.5" x 11 5/8") - Mat thickness is 0.75 mm (approx. 1/32"). Perfect for baking, kneading, rolling, candy/macaron/pastry/cookie/bun/bread making as well as for freezing meat balls, dumplings, fruits and vegetables.

FOOD SAFE/NON-TOXIC & HEALTHY: Made of premium quality non-toxic materials passed strict FDA approved tests. No oil or fat is required for baking which reduces intake of cholesterol, saturated fat & cancerogenic substances produced by cooking oils subjected to high temperatures.

OVEN/MICROWAVE/DISHWASHER/FREEZER SAFE - DURABLE & LONG LASTING: It's flexible yet tear resistant, and designed to withstand thousands of uses under extreme conditions of bitter cold and intense heat (from -40F to up to 480F).

NON-STICK & EASY-TO-CLEAN: No more scrubbing! Even burnt sugar and fat falls off on its on. Just rinse the mat in warm soapy water to clean it. You can also wash it in your dishwasher. Repeated multiple uses and washing cycles do not affect non-stick properties of the mat. After every use and cleanup, it will be just like new again.

PERFECT, CONSISTENT RESULTS: Silicone/fiberglass hybrid construction helps to distribute heat evenly along the entire baking surface therefore you always get perfect consistent results every time you bake - no more burned and under-baked spots. Look at the pictures of the bread I cooked. It's perfect all around!
